basic.description:
The continuation of ITLN P10/3.0. Also for students who have some knowledge of Italian but have not completed 4U Italian or equivalent. For these students an assessment interview with the instructor is required before registration. Contact the Department of Languages, Literatures and Cultures for details.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: ITLN
basic.title: Beginning Italian II

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A grade of C in ITLN P10.
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from ITLN P10; ITLN101; ITLN112.
One Way Exclusion    May not be taken with or after ITLN204; ITLN205.
